如何看待？每天都看！
[url=https://twitter.com/DonaldJTrumpJr][/url][url=https://twitter.com/DonaldJTrumpJr][/url]Donald Trump Jr.

If China spent less time covering up their flaws to save face and more time trying to develop medical technologies rather than simply stealing everyone else’s innovations we would all be way better off today. #ChinaLiedPeopleDied[url=https://twitter.com/DonaldJTrumpJr][/url]
